cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Dorm Room is equipped with a Three Bunk Beds, Two Drawers, Closet and a Mini-Fridge. For security, we have installed lockers for any valuables. It is well lit with 2 lights in the room with a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Spotlessly clean room with windows. Bed linen supplied however, towels can be purchased/hired from the reception. Room consists of a wardrobe, lockers, table, chair and fridge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.labelDescription: Bunk bed with fan, heating and wifi. Male Only.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Single Room is has a Single Bed, Closet, Storage Space, Desk with a Chair and a Mini-Fridge. It is well lit with 2 lights and a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight. Some of our Single Rooms offer Beautiful Harbour Side View.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Twin Room is equipped with a Two Single Beds, Closet, Small Drawer and a Mini-Fridge. It is well lit with 2 lights in the room with a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The YMCA Hostel Double Room is a large room equipped with a Double Bed, Closet, Desk with a chair and a Mini-Fridge. It is well lit with 2 lights in the room with a clear window to receive plenty of sunlight.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
